import { Component, ElementRef, OnInit, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { createPopper } from '@popperjs/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-ttms-header', templateUrl: './ttms-header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ttms-header.component.scss'] }) export class TtmsHeaderComponent implements OnInit { @ViewChild('navbarDropdown') dropDown!: ElementRef; @ViewChild('navbarNav') navBar!: ElementRef; ngOnInit(): void { createPopper(this.dropDown.nativeElement,this.dropDown.nativeElement,{ placement: 'top' }) } }
